name: After School Program - Excelsior
description: The after school program serves youth in grades K-5 to develop life long recreation and leisure skills. Participants will receive homework assistance, be exposed to an environment that will promote literacy, encourage communication and empowerment skills while providing recreation activities that include sports, group games, arts and culture, community exploration and seasonal special events. All staff and volunteers receive background checks and are trained in safety skills. Start times may var

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
